text:
London, UK - Front-end, RoR and iOS developers

We're ramping up a new internal tech team to allow us to build our own products and tools (for internal and public use) and need great developers to help us build up and potentially lead a team of likeminded individuals.

More info: http://uk.authenticjobs.com/jobs/13719/senior-front-end-deve... http://uk.authenticjobs.com/jobs/14841/senior-ror-developer and http://uk.authenticjobs.com/jobs/14840/senior-ios-developer
